queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:bb_product_packages` ( `bb_package_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `product` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL default '1' COMMENT '0=inactive, 1=active', PRIMARY KEY (`bb_package_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_notifications` ( `bb_notify_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `notify_string` VARCHAR(255), `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_notify_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_requests` ( `bb_bid_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `request_item_id` int(11), `ip_address` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bb_bid_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_bids_archive` ( `archive_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request_item_id` int(11), `min_amt` DECIMAL(10,2), `user_id` INT(11), PRIMARY KEY (`archive_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:bb_bids` ( `bb_item_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `request_item_id` int(11), `min_amt` DECIMAL(10,2), `user_id` INT(11), PRIMARY KEY (`bb_item_id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
